name: boltbox
description: A collection of jackbox inspired party games

scripts.begin: browserify Client/client.js -o Client/bundle.js && lessc Client/styles.less Client/styles.css && node index.js
scripts.bundle: browserify Client/client.js -o Client/bundle.js -p tinyify && lessc Client/styles.less Client/styles.css && node index.js
scripts.start: nodemon --exec npm run begin --ext js,html,less --ignore Client/bundle.js
